title: Fall of a Demigod
description: For the last 50 years Caim has been living the life of a demigod. He has been living with the evolved elves known as the Effeelions in a city floating in the sky. The demigod vowed the Effeelions that he would help them in their quest to find the realm of Cosmus. However, lately the demigod has been having some humanly desires. He begins to miss his life as a human. One day Caim witnesses how his humanly desires brought danger to the sky city.
author: A.J. Martinez
